txt.en: 'Blasted Angmar! Leave the mines behind until we can muster reinforcements!'
'While I still draw breath I shall keep these mines!'
'Back behind the battlements, we've no need to pursue these dogs further!'
'Now, you're getting me angry! Baruk Khaz√¢d!'
'Begone from beneath this mountain of stone and ore!'
'Come forth fell beasts and face the master of the mines!'
